title: New Black cleaver and build path
body:
Hi! i'm from euw, so i can't post on the PBE board. For that reason i'm creating here a topic about the new black cleaver. 

I Really love it! but the build path sounds really weird. As a lot of people said in the topic on the bpe board, {{item:3044}} + {{item:3134}}  ar a lot better then {{item:3044}} +{{item:3067}} . With this path it will be better maybe 300 or 350HP and 45AD bonus. 
Everyone will be happy, phage and brutalizer will have both 2 possible paths, tank and bruiser will still have kill potential thanks to brutalizer.
I also think that evolve the flat 10arm Pen to 30% armor pen it's ok. you'll still have more then 10arm pen, so i don't see any problem.
please riot. listen the community and make {{item:3071}} build path {{item:3044}} + {{item:3134}} instead of  {{item:3044}} +{{item:3067}}

replies.body: I think they wanna take Big Black Cleaver away from squishies and make it Bruiser/Tank centric. So yeah, this would be the way to go. Look at it on the bright side, it's a Zed nerf too.
I don't know, zed can still build it. It will make him slipperier, less squishy, give him cdr, still shred your armor for his ult, i'm not sure it's a Zed nerf. Maybe i'm wrong but i'm not sure why.
Yeah I get your arguments. Honestly it is quite difficult to say. We'll have to see how it plays out.
I just think it's crazy weird how they are turning BC into a better FM, and leaving FM as is?
Hi i'm from NA and I'm replying to this topic.
Nope... the core idea is take-off the flat armor pen, they say that the Essence Reaver build path now uses Brutalizer so, ER is the item for AD Caster.
